summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 CHEVROLET TRAILBLAZER. THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED IN A RESIDENTIAL GARAGE WHEN THE REAR WINDSHIELD GLASS EXPLODED UNEXPECTEDLY. THERE WAS NO PERSONAL INJURY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER FOR INSPECTION. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE CONTACT HAD SIGNIFICANT CONCERNS OF THE POTENTIAL SAFETY HAZARD INVOLVED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 137,000.
